byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and RICHARD A. OPPEL JR

abstract: Tuesday night's debate raised the prospect of a nasty, brutish and potentially long nomination fight between Rick Perry and Mitt Romney.
snippet: Tuesday night's debate raised the prospect of a nasty, brutish and potentially long nomination fight between Rick Perry and Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: 12:55 p.m. | Updated Rick Perry and Mitt Romney braced Wednesday for a new, more aggressive phase in their presidential rivalry after a debate Tuesday night in which both men made clear how deep the personal animosity between them goes.

headline.main: Debate Suggests Brutish Campaign to Come
